SUMMARY: Return options: In-store returns are available at MALL partner stores. Free returns are offered for customers with the "Smart!" program. Providers: In-store returns are handled by "partnerské obchody MALL". No other specific return providers are mentioned. Costs: Returns are free with the "Smart!" program. Other return costs are not specified. Restrictions: A 14-day return period is available for returns without stating a reason. NOTABLE FEATURES: 14-day return window without needing to state a reason. Free returns for "Smart!" program members. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The website provides limited and fragmented return information. Details on specific return methods (like home collection or parcel drop-offs) are missing. Information is primarily focused on in-store returns and the "Smart!" program benefit.
